title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions:
1. Boil pasta.
2. Fry guanciale.
3. Mix eggs and cheese.
4. Combine pasta with sauce and guanciale.
5. Serve with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken.
2. Grill chicken.
3. Cook sauce with tomatoes and spices.
4. Add cream.
5. Combine with chicken.

title: Jollof Rice
summary: A beloved West African dish made with rice, tomatoes, and spices.
instructions:
1. Blend tomatoes, peppers, onions.
2. Fry the sauce.
3. Add rice and stock.
4. Cook until rice is tender.
5. Serve hot.
